EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Inner Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain proficiency with Handwraps. You also gain +10 Maximum Ki per Epic/Legendary Level if you have at least one level of Monk or are in the Grandmaster of Flowers Destiny Mantle.
Each Core ability of this tree grants, including this one, grants the following:
+25 Maximum Hit Points +5 Melee Power +5 Ranged Power +1 Spell Resistance

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Disciple of Material
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Material Type. Your weapons bypass the chosen material type. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Physical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Adamantine
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Adamantine DR type. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Physical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Byeshk
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Byeshk DR type. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Physical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Cold Iron
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Cold Iron DR type. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Physical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Crystal
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Crystal DR type. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Physical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Silver
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Silver DR type. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Physical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

Effect.DisplayName: Grandmaster of Flowers: Disciple of Material
Grandmaster of Flowers: Disciple of Material

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Disciple of Morality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Alignment. Your weapons bypass the chosen alignment. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Magical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Chaotic
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Chaotic DR type. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Magical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Evil
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Evil DR type. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Magical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Good
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Good DR type. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Magical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lawful
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your weapons bypass the Lawful DR type. Regardless of your choice you gain +5 Magical Resistance Rating, or +10 if you have the Discipline feat.

Effect.DisplayName: Grandmaster of Flowers: Disciple of Morality
Grandmaster of Flowers: Disciple of Morality

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Disciple of Philosophy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Philosophy to embody with your strikes.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dark: Forbidden Philosophy
EnhancementSelection.Description:
+3% Dodge Bypass, +10 Magical Resistance Rating Cap. Your Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist feats are now Dark building attacks for your Monk Finishing Moves.
(Note: these appear as separate feats in your feat list so you may continue to use their original versions without building attack elemental affiliations if you so desire.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Light: Enlightening Philosophy
EnhancementSelection.Description:
+3% Dodge Bypass, +10 Magical Resistance Rating Cap. Your Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist feats are now Light building attacks for your Monk Finishing Moves.
(Note: these appear as separate feats in your feat list so you may continue to use their original versions without building attack elemental affiliations if you so desire.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Void: Aberrant Philosophy
EnhancementSelection.Description:
+3% Dodge Bypass, +10 Magical Resistance Rating Cap. Your Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist feats are now Void building attacks for your Monk Finishing Moves.
(Note: these appear as separate feats in your feat list so you may continue to use their original versions without building attack elemental affiliations if you so desire.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Strike with Poise
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Stunning DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Disciple's Studies
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Heal, Diplomacy and Intimidate. Rank 3: +10 Positive, Negative, and Repair Amplification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Serenity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Grandmaster of Flowers Destiny Mantle: You may now fight with the Unarmed combat style as if you were a Monk, and may be Centered and use Ki. When you attack with Handwraps or begin falling, you will use the Monk class' animations instead of your own. You gain a +15% Action Boost bonus to movement speed, and no longer take damage from falling. Finally, you are unbothered by the physical restraints of the world: you may tumble through enemies, and are immune to slippery surfaces and most forms of knockdown.
You also gain 10 Ki for training this enhancement.

Stance.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers Destiny Mantle
Stance.Description: Grandmaster of Flowers Destiny Mantle: You may now fight with the Unarmed combat style as if you were a Monk, and may be Centered and use Ki. When you attack with Handwraps or begin falling, you will use the Monk class' animations instead of your own. You gain a +15% Action Boost bonus to movement speed, and no longer take damage from falling. Finally, you are unbothered by the physical restraints of the world: you may tumble through enemies, and are immune to slippery surfaces and most forms of knockdown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Gain Strength
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a way to restore yourself.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Inner Focus
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your soul is like a great garden, and its beauty and perfection depend on how you tend it during all seasons. You may activate this ability to focus your thoughts and instantly restore 10d12 Ki. Cooldown: [120/90/60] seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Wholeness of Spirit
EnhancementSelection.Description: Bring your mind, body, and soul into harmonious balance, restoring health as if you were affected by the benefits of a Heal spell, as well as curing all ability damage, negative levels, and other Adverse Conditions that may be affecting you. Cooldown: [120/90/60] seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Enlightenment
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[15/30/45] Maximum Ki and +[2/4/6] Concentration. Rank 3: +1 Passive Ki Generation.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Calm before Storms
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Spell Resistance. Rank 3: You no longer automatically fail Will saving throws when you roll a natural 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Grandmaster Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an Epic Strike

EnhancementSelection.Name: Drifting Lotus
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals +10% Damage +1 Critical Multiplier +1 Critical Threat Range Cost: 30 Ki Cooldown: 15 seconds
Epic Strike: Melee Cleave attack, deals 1d6+5 Force damage per character level to all enemies struck. The force damage scales with the higher of Melee or Ranged power, and is doubled versus Tainted Creatures (Undead, Aberrations, Evil Outsiders).
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Orchid Blossom
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds
Epic Strike: A blossom is released from your palm in a line, exploding when it makes contact, dealing 1d6+10 Force damage per character level to all enemies within. The force damage scales with the higher of Melee or Ranged power, and is doubled versus Tainted Creatures (Undead, Aberrations, Evil Outsiders). Grants [5/10/25] Ki when used.
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: A Dance of Flowers
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in the Grandmaster of Flowers Destiny Mantle, your weapons gain +1[W].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Lotus Blades
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a feat to gain access to without meeting its prerequisites.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lotus Blades - Deflection
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain the Deflect Arrows feat, letting you knock aside one projectile every 6 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lotus Blades - Longbow
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain the effects of the Zen Archery feat, and may use Longbows as if they were Ki weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lotus Blades - Longsword
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain the effects of the Whirling Steel Strike feat, and may use Longswords as if they were Ki weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lotus Blades - Sickle
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain the effects of the Prescient Curve feat, and may use Sickles as if they were Ki weapons.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Hail of Blows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5% Offhand Strike chance, +10% Strikethrough, +3% Doublestrike and Doubleshot.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: The Flickering Flame
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to hit and damage. Rank 3: +25% Fire Absorption. If you are in Sun Stance, the bonuses of this enhancement are doubled.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Flow of Water
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all Saving Throws, you take [5/10/15]% less damage while Helpless. Rank 3: +25% Cold Absorption. If you are in Ocean Stance, the bonuses of this enhancement are doubled.

Effect.DisplayName: The Flow of Water + Ocean Stance
The Flow of Water + Ocean Stance
The Flow of Water + Ocean Stance

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Serene Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in the Grandmaster of Flowers Destiny Mantle, you deal +[5/10/15]% bonus damage to the Helpless.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Catch the Wind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3]% Dodge chance and +[2/4/6] Armor Class. Rank 3: +25% Electric Absorption. If you are in Wind Stance, the bonuses of this enhancement are doubled.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Strength of Stone
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Maximum Hit Points, +[2/4/6] Physical Resistance Rating. Rank 3: +25% Acid Absorption. If you are in Mountain Stance, the bonuses of this enhancement are doubled.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: The Clarity of Law
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks bypass [5/10/15]% of enemy Fortification. Rank 3: +15% Law Absorption.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: The Serenity of Good
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Saves vs Enchantments, Curses, and Illusions, and +[2/4/6] Magical Resistance Rating. Rank 3: +15% Good Absorption

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Lotus Bloom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Drifting Lotus and Orchid Blossom now attempts to Stun all enemies struck. Stun DC: 20 + Highest Ability Score Mod + Stunning Bonuses. This stun lasts 4 seconds for Drifting Lotus and 2 seconds for Orchid Blossom.

DC.Name: Lotus Bloom
DC.Description: Drifting Lotus and Orchid Blossom now attempts to Stun all enemies struck. This stun lasts 4 seconds for Drifting Lotus and 2 seconds for Orchid Blossom.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: The Delight of Chaos
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Critical Hit Confirmation and Critical Hit Damage. Rank 3: +15% Chaos Absorption

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: The Cruelty of Evil
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Sneak Attack and Sneak Attack Damage. Rank 3: +15% Evil Absorption

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Beyond the Center
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Magical Resistance Rating Cap. Rank 3: +15% Force Absorption

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Imposing Force
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While centered, when rolling a 19 or 20 on an attack, your Critical Multiplier is increased by +1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Everything is Nothing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Cost: 50 Ki Cooldown: 3 minutes
Your state of luminous consciousness allows your will to alter the fabric of the planes, ripping your foes out of time and space. Up to six nearby non-boss enemies must make a saving throw (DC: 20 + Highest Ability Score Mod + Stunning Bonuses) or be erased from the multi-verse. If they succeed at their saving throw, they are instead paralyzed by temporal shock for six seconds.
When you activate Everything is Nothing, you are affected by Emptiness for 5 minutes.
Emptiness: +3% Dodge, +1% Dodge cap. You gain the effects of the Elusive Target feat, or if you already have it, it instead has double the chance to proc.

DC.Name: Everything is Nothing
DC.Description: Your state of luminous consciousness allows your will to alter the fabric of the planes, ripping your foes out of time and space. Up to six nearby non-boss enemies must make a saving throw (DC: 20 + Highest Ability Score Mod + Stunning Bonuses) or be erased from the multi-verse. If they succeed at their saving throw, they are instead paralyzed by temporal shock for six seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Split the Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Cost: 100 Ki Cooldown: 5 minutes
Epic Moment: For 30 seconds, your soul is split, and a fragment of it manifests beside you as a combatant. Your Soul Warrior provides the following benefits:
Offensive (Dark): Your attacks may strike an additional target regardless of weapon type, and each attack has a 5% chance of banishing your enemies from the multi-verse with no save.
Defensive (Light): Your Soul Warrior also grants you 25% Concealment, 25% Incorporeality, and 25% Dodge/max Dodge, as your physical form is less present while you are in this state.
If you follow a Monk Philosophy, your split soul will embody that choice (either Light or Dark), doubling either the Offensive (Dark) portions or Defensive (Light) portions.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Grandmaster of Flowers: Legendary Flurry of Blows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+[1/2/3]% Doublestrike and Doubleshot, +[3/6/10]% Strikethrough, +[3/6/10]% Offhand Strike chance.
Rank 3: While dual wielding (including handwraps) or using a quarterstaff, you gain: On Vorpal: Break an enemy's guard, as per a Guardbreaking effect.
Guardbreaking: This item enables you to break an enemy's guard in between your melee attacks. On critical hits with your melee weapons, enemies will become dazed as a result.
